Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted with the finest materials and expertise, offering unparalleled quality and functionality. We believe its true value exceeds $10000, reflecting its exceptional craftsmanship and potential impact on your endeavors. For you, we're offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $15000. This opportunity is tailored to provide you with an extraordinary advantage in your field, enhancing your capabilities and setting new standards. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience and achievements. Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
